name: Bazett Fraga Mcremitz (Fate Hollow Ataraxia)
description:
V2 Description

Previews for new version have been made with weights 0.8-1. Default weight is fine in general, but I found the hands get a bit more mangled than usual, maybe because often worn gloves, so lowering weight helps at times.

I've organized keywords better in this new version so you can use following prompts for 3 outfits:

  • Regular outfit - bazett fraga mcremitz, earrings, red necktie, brown jacket, white shirt, pant suit, brown pants

  • Grey coat outfit (FGO first ascension) - bazett fraga mcremitz, black necktie, black jacket, red shirt, grey coat, pant suit, black pants

  • Bodysuit (FGO second ascension) - bazett fraga mcremitz, low ponytail, black bodysuit

Bodysuit should have already been there in V1, but I didn't had it all properly tagged since I wasn't really doing multiple outfits at that point. It's not really very accurate through, I just went with "looks about right" there.

More tips:

  • You can optionally use black gloves with the suits.

  • If you want to remove jacket remove both brown jacket and pant suit.

  • For close-ups it's better to remove pant suit too since it somewhat implies pants.

  • She wears a necktie clip on the black necktie and not on red, but sadly it's leaking through and appears anyway. You can add tie clip to negatives, but it only helps a bit.

  • I haven't really been using any footwear tags, seems to work appropriately anyway, but you can try black footwear or black boots if you need.

  • energy ball works worse in V2 because it seems to show up yellow usually T_T

  • When doing coat outfit and full body shot it's good idea to add long coat.

Also shoutout to this Lora model that adds extra details https://civitai.com/models/82098?modelVersionId=87153 No reason not to try this, makes good images better.

V1 Description

Model for Bazett from Fate Hollow Ataraxia. From my experience best used with weight around 0.8.

I'm pretty dissapointed in this one because I think it's one of my less consistent ones and I spend a lot of time on it. Still as usual, since with some effort it can produce nice images, hopefully someone will use it and my effort won't be wasted ^_^;

Prompt for bazett fraga mcremitz and add a lot of description. For standard outfit use suit, pant suit, formal, necktie, earrings, jacket, white shirt. Pant suit apparently is how booru name female suit with pants, if you're wondering. If you want to have her without jacket leave it just at necktie, earrings, white shirt since the suit tags seems to imply jacket. You might have to add pants then too.

Also you can have her in her coat if you add coat and of coarse gloves fits as well, if they don't show up by themselves.

It's v2 because I tried add fragarach keyword for container on her back, but looks like I still don't know how to do that. if you set it with stupid high weight you might notice a tall trash bin or a weird looking light pole. That's about how that worked out -_-

Oh, but you can get pretty good looking energy ball. Kinda hard to get it at right place, but looks nice.

modelVersions.name: V2
trainedWords: earrings, red necktie, brown jacket, white shirt, pant suit, brown pant
black necktie, black jacket, red shirt, grey coat, pant suit, black pants
modelVersions.description:
Pros:

  • Better outputs in general

  • More compatible, works better with default weight

  • More accurate earrings

  • Different outfits separated better

  • Bodysuit outfit

Cons:

  • Hands about as bad or worse

  • Energy ball has a wrong color
